column8:
The oldest naval ship still in commission, Her Majesty's Ship Victory is a 100-gun First Rate ship of the line and is famous as being the ship that Vice Admiral Nelson was killed on during the Battle of Trafalgar.

I love these old ships and decide to make this design using a painting of the Victory in the battle of Trafalgar and some old line-drawings of it on either side.
column21: Admiral Nelson's famous ship the Victory is celebrated here on this t-shirt from weadmire.net.
